definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Glutamine is the most abundant amino acid that composes muscle.
sentences.chinese: 穀氨酸是肌肉的一個重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Glutamate is a fast excitatory transmitter in mammalian brains.
sentences.chinese: 卓敏穀氨酸是哺乳動物腦中的興奮性遞質。

sentences.english: The result showed that the loss of GA is very small after MSG mother liquor desalted in IEP.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明味精母液在等電點脫鹽後，穀氨酸損失很小。

sentences.english: The glutamic dehydrogenase activity was restrained after fumigation.
sentences.chinese: 薰氣後穀氨酸脫氫酶的活性受到抑制。

sentences.english: The content of glutamic zinc was assayed by volumetry method.
sentences.chinese: 採用容量法測定穀氨酸鋅含量。

sentences.english: This article is to establish a method for measuring spirulina protein by glutamate dehydrogenase.
sentences.chinese: 建立一種用穀氨酸脫氫酶測定螺旋藻蛋白質的方法。

sentences.english: The last aminoacid of C terminal is glutamic acid and its molecular weight is150D.
sentences.chinese: 符合我們設計的原性分子的C末端穀氨酸的分子量。

sentences.english: The effect of monosodium glutamate on aluminum absorption was investigated in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 用翻轉的離體腸斷研究了穀氨酸鈉對鋁吸收的影響。

sentences.english: Glutamate is always present in the brain, where it carries nerve impulses across the gaps between cells.
sentences.chinese: 腦內通常含有穀氨酸，負責傳遞細胞間神經衝動。

sentences.english: An auto-associative neural network(AANN) was used to detect faults from glutamic acid fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用自聯想神經網絡對穀氨酸發酵進行故障診斷。

sentences.english: Glutamic dehydrogenase was found to be present in the fat bodies of Tryporyza incertulas Walker and Tessaratoma papittosa Drury.
sentences.chinese: 在三化螟與荔枝蝽脂肪體中均存在穀氨酸脫氫酶。

sentences.english: Microinjection of L-glutamate into VMNHalso produced an inhibition of diaphragmatic activities.
sentences.chinese: 微量注射穀氨酸鈉於此區，膈肌活動也受到抑制。

sentences.english: The microcapsules comprise a humectant such as sodium pyroglutamate.
sentences.chinese: 這種微囊包含一種吸溼劑，如焦穀氨酸鈉。

sentences.english: Glutamate might play an important role in the seasickness adaptability formation.
sentences.chinese: 穀氨酸在暈船適應的過程中可能發揮重要作用。
